p.s: In my opinion the given scene focuses more on the problem of gangs than in the novel since in the novel Maverick argues with a normal civilliancivilian while in the movie he argues with a King Lord which concludes to the fact that the argument between a King lord and Maverick is more dangerous than the argument with a civilliancivilian.
